{{codepointer|Classic attack|Strife|r=Programmer}} '''A_SpotLightning'''
(no parameters)
==Usage== Spawns a {{Class|SpectralLightningSpot}}, set its <tt>threshold</tt> field to 25, its health to -2, its <tt>target</tt> to the calling actor and its <tt>tracer</tt> to the calling actor's target (standard operating procedure for homing missiles).
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|SpectralMonster}} and {{Class|Programmer}} and actors inheriting from one of those.
